<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2169</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Quadrati Magici</string>
            <string language="en">Magic Squares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magische Quadrate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Places Magiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quadrados Mágicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγικά τετράγωνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadrados Mágicos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">I quadrati magici hanno la stessa somma lungo tutte le colonne e tutte le righe. Siete in grado di risolvere i diversi quadrati?</string>
            <string language="en">Magical squares have the same sum along all columns and all rows. Can you solve the different squares?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">soluzione di problemi</string>
            <string language="en">problem solving</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magische Quadrate haben die gleiche Summe entlang 
allen Spalten und allen Reihen. Können Sie die 
unterschiedlichen Quadrate lösen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les places magiques ont la même somme le long de 
toutes les colonnes et de toutes les lignes. Pouvez-vous 
résoudre les différentes places ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os quadrados mágicos têm a mesma soma ao longo 
de todas as colunas e de todas as fileiras. Pode você resolver 
os quadrados diferentes?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα μαγικά τετράγωνα έχουν το ίδιο ποσό κατά μήκος 
όλων των στηλών και όλων των σειρών. Μπορείτε να λύσετε τα
διαφορετικά τετράγωνα;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los cuadrados mágicos tienen la misma suma a lo 
largo de todas las columnas y de todas las filas. ¿Puede usted 
solucionar los diversos cuadrados?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen von Problemen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résolution des problèmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resolver de problema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίλυση προβλήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el solucionar de problema</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
